meanings.definition: To officially join or register in a program or organization.
meanings.sent1: I will enroll in the art class next week.
meanings.sent2: Students can enroll in the school choir for the upcoming performance.
meanings.sent3: After much thought, I decided to enroll in the cooking class to impress my family.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to enroll in the dance program was like taking a leap of faith.
meanings.sent5: Enrolling in the fitness club made her feel motivated and excited to start exercising.

meanings.definition: To sign up or become a member of something.
meanings.sent1: She wants to enroll in the book club to discuss her favorite novels.
meanings.sent2: Many people choose to enroll in the gym to stay healthy and fit.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would enroll in a knitting class, but here I am!
meanings.sent4: Enrolling in the photography workshop was like unlocking a new passion.
meanings.sent5: The decision to enroll in the language course opened up a world of opportunities for her.
